Sentencas: Due to high conversion efficiency and low environmental impact, solid-oxide fuel cells coupled with a gas turbine (SOFC-GT) have received much attention.
Titulo: Partial-Load Analysis of a Temperature-Controlled Solid-Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine (SOFC-GT) Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: A proper stack temperature control strategy ensures safety and enhances performance.
Titulo: Partial-Load Analysis of a Temperature-Controlled Solid-Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine (SOFC-GT) Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: A heat management subsystem capable of adjusting the stack temperature is critical for the hybrid plant.
Titulo: Partial-Load Analysis of a Temperature-Controlled Solid-Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine (SOFC-GT) Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: Most present SOFC-GT plants deliver the full volume of the GT's exhaust to heat up the stack.
Titulo: Partial-Load Analysis of a Temperature-Controlled Solid-Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine (SOFC-GT) Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: Stack cooling is realized by blowing extra air, which consumes more parasitic energy and impacts the plant's conversion efficiency.
Titulo: Partial-Load Analysis of a Temperature-Controlled Solid-Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine (SOFC-GT) Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: In this study, a heat management subsystem has been added into the SOFC-GT plant.
Titulo: Partial-Load Analysis of a Temperature-Controlled Solid-Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine (SOFC-GT) Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: The stack average temperature can be adjusted by controlling the volume of the GT's exhaust and additional fuel.
Titulo: Partial-Load Analysis of a Temperature-Controlled Solid-Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine (SOFC-GT) Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: In this way, the parasitic energy owing to the air compressor is reduced.
Titulo: Partial-Load Analysis of a Temperature-Controlled Solid-Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine (SOFC-GT) Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: To investigate the proposed plant's performance, a corresponding model has been established.
Titulo: Partial-Load Analysis of a Temperature-Controlled Solid-Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine (SOFC-GT) Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: Simulation results of the specific operating point show that the heat management subsystem can maintain the stack average temperature at its proper value.
Titulo: Partial-Load Analysis of a Temperature-Controlled Solid-Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine (SOFC-GT) Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: Furthermore, based on the different air/additional fuel supply patterns, the partial-load performance of the proposed plant has been compared, and an optimal partial-load strategy is proposed.
Titulo: Partial-Load Analysis of a Temperature-Controlled Solid-Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine (SOFC-GT) Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: The proposed SOFC-GT plant shows a wide output range (370.0-1540.7kW) with remarkable efficiency (56.8%-75.0%).
Titulo: Partial-Load Analysis of a Temperature-Controlled Solid-Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine (SOFC-GT) Hybrid Power Plant
